definition: a statement expressing excessive pride in oneself : the act or an instance of boasting (see boast entry 2) : brag
examples: It may sound like a boast, but I truly am very wealthy.

definition: to praise oneself extravagantly in speech : speak of oneself with excessive pride
to speak of or assert with excessive pride
examples: He liked to boast that he was the richest man in town.

definition: to possess and often call attention to (something that is a source of pride)

examples: a room boasting no more than a desk and a chair

definition: to shape (stone) roughly in sculpture and stonecutting as a preliminary to finer work
